timeline.message:
[ML] Remove unused RequestBuilder definitions

Remove the unused definitions of RequestBuilder classes from the ml
actions within the core plugin.

timeline.bodyText: I think most (if not all) empty Request constructors existed only for the purpose of being called in RequestBuilders. Would it make sense to get rid of those empty constructors now?
timeline.author: przemekwitek

replies.bodyText:
Thanks @przemekwitek. If those constructors are now not used then yes, I think now is the time to remove them.
Update: An audit of the code reveals that while a number of the empty, default Request constructors are now no longer used, others still are, either in object parsers or test cases. Because this is ever so slightly non-trivial I'll make this the subject of another PR and will push the changes here as they stand.
replies.author: edsavage
